comment: Always had issue with auto enhace feature, it adds a lot of tint to the photos. (it is funny that the thubnail for the enhancement looks good, but it is not what you get when you apply it). The new update has a weird UI and the placement of controls are not user friendly, and looks toy-ish. Liked the old interface with all the slider controls in one place.
scenarios: When using the auto enhance feature, it adds a lot of tint to the photos, which is not reflected in the thumbnail for the enhancement.
The new update has a weird UI with controls that are not user-friendly and look toy-ish, different from the old interface where all slider controls were in one place.
key sentence: The new update has a weird UI with controls that are not user-friendly and look toy-ish, different from the old interface where all slider controls were in one place.
